thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 5 of 265
thread.title: Brook

author: Brook
title: Brook
text: I started Hello Fresh through a groupon deal and never intended to keep the subscription once the promotional price was over. However, I have thoroughly enjoyed each and every meal I have cooked since subscribing over 2 months ago. Some are a little better than others, but there are a lot of exotic new flavors that some people will appreciate more than others. I have never considered myself great in the kitchen, but now I feel like I am a good cook!! My husband is loving it as well. Only once was an ingredient missing (well not missing just not enough of) and as soon as I contacted customer service they promptly credited back my payment. I have never had a problem with the quality of the ingredients
